mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS (JOB_NAME, JOB_GROUP, JOB_CLASS_NAME) VALUES (#{jobName}, #{jobGroup}, #{jobClassName})
INSERT INTO QRTZ_TRIGGERS (TRIGGER_NAME, TRIGGER_GROUP, JOB_NAME, JOB_GROUP, CRON_EXPRESSION) VALUES (#{triggerName}, #{triggerGroup}, #{jobName}, #{jobGroup}, #{cronExpression})
